EmailTemplate.name: CSM INSITE completed Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} is Pending Approval For INSITE Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This request has been completed. The activation keys will be sent from the new system email noreply.identity@cummins.com . Please save this email address to your contact list to avoid the emails going to your spam or junk mail. This may take a little bit, please let us know if you do not receive your email by end of business. If you have difficulty inputting the keys to your Insite, please reach out to our tech support team at one of the following :-
Insite Technical Support – Contact Info:
Phone: 1-800-286-6467 option 2 and then option 4 Or Email: servicetoolsupport@cummins.com Or www.Insite.cummins.com (chat with support)
At this time, your keys will need to be manually activated.
Directions to Activate your new license:
• Open Insite • Go to manage licenses • After the configuration tool Is open, shut Insite down in the background • Click on activate licenses/counts put in basic Key and hit activate, then put in the functional key (Lite/Pro) and hit activate • Your keys will now be active.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
